summary: REQ-1 src update appears implemented in HomeNavbar.tsx, but the change set violates the constraint/AC that only the selected element be changed because two additional files were modified. REQ-2 (adding the static logo file under frontend/public/assets/generated/) is not evidenced in the diff (no added file).

missing_requirements.requirement: Only the selected navbar logo element is changed (no unrelated images/components are modified).
missing_requirements.reason: The diff shows additional modified files beyond the selected element in frontend/src/components/home/HomeNavbar.tsx, which contradicts the requirement/constraint to apply changes ONLY to the selected element.

missing_requirements.requirement: Ensure the static logo file Tshabalala-1080-x-1080-px-1-e1745416117212-r66kph3gxuhfsp0hg1525ae50su5inwh0amb0wdpkg.png exists at frontend/public/assets/generated/ so it is served at /assets/generated/...
missing_requirements.reason: No files were added in the diff summary, and there is no evidence that the required .png file was added to frontend/public/assets/generated/.

hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest required changing only the selected navbar logo element in HomeNavbar.tsx and did not request documentation updates.
BuildRequest did not request any changes to project tracking/state files and explicitly constrained changes to the selected element only.
